actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.
Committee on Veterans requested executive comment from Department of Veterans Affairs, Office of Management and Budget, and Department of Defense.
Committee on Veterans received executive comment from Department of Veterans Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, chapter 41, to revise the definition of "eligible veteran", and for other purposes.
short_title: Veterans' Employment and Training Amendment of 1990

summary.text: Veterans' Employment and Training Amendment of 1990 - Provides eligibility for veterans' counseling, training, and placement services to veterans who have served on active duty for more than 180 days and who are eligible for discharge or release from such duty under conditions other than dishonorable within 90 days.

titles.title: Veterans' Employment and Training Amendment of 1990
A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, chapter 41, to revise the definition of "eligible veteran", and for other purposes.
